dict.acceptation: 空闲时间；闲暇；悠闲；安逸；

sent.orig: Outdoor leisure furniture, leisure and chair; accessories as fold tents etc.
sent.trans: 户外休闲家具；休闲桌椅；折叠帐篷等户外家具配件。

sent.orig: Peaceful people, never to be haunted by a busy leisure tight in busy leisure.
sent.trans: 平和的人，从不被忙碌所萦绕，闲时吃紧，忙里悠闲。

sent.orig: Positive leisure attitudes are essential for motivating people to use their leisure in creative ways.
sent.trans: 积极的休闲态度是鼓励人们创造性地利用空闲时间的基础。

sent.orig: Leisure is a historical field. In class society, leisure has class character.
sent.trans: 休闲是一个历史范畴，在阶级社会里，休闲具有阶级性。

sent.orig: Much of the leisure time is used in play.
sent.trans: 大部分的休闲时光都用于玩乐。
